code: import React,{useEffect}from'react';import{connect}from'react-redux';import Spinner from'../layouts/Spinner';import{getGithubRepos}from'../../actions/profile';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ProfileGithub=_ref=>{let{username,getGithubRepos,repos}=_ref;useEffect(()=>{getGithubRepos(username);},[getGithubRepos,username]);console.log("repos: ",repos);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"profile-github",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"text-primary-app my-1",children:"Github Repos"}),repos===null?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Spinner,{}):repos.map(repo=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"repo bg-white p-1 my-1",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h4",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:repo.html_url,target:"_blank",rel:"noopener noreferrer",children:repo.name})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:repo.description})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("ul",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{className:"badge-app badge-app-primary",children:["Stars: ",repo.stargazers_count]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{className:"badge-app badge-app-dark",children:["Watchers: ",repo.watchers_count]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{className:"badge-app badge-app-light",children:["Forks: ",repo.forks_count]})]})})]},"repo._id"))]});};const mapStateToProps=state=>({repos:state.profile.repos});export default connect(mapStateToProps,{getGithubRepos})(ProfileGithub);
